name: Far From Home (garyli, fontainec, catmaya)
description:
Far From Home is a single player adventure game that takes place on an alien planet. You have just crashed your ship and must find all the missing parts to repair it.

You’ll journey through 4 different biomes each with different obstacles and enemies that you must overcome. As you explore the planet, you will learn about the planet's history and meet previous survivors who attempted to escape but failed. The low-poly art style was inspired by the games Journey and Subnautica.

Remember to treat this planet as your home but never forget that it is not.

Controls
  • WASD or Arrow keys - Move
  • Mouse - Rotate camera
  • Space - Jump
  • ESC or P - Pause
Credits Gary Li
